name: Andrew Mossin
bio: Andrew Mossin is the author of numerous chapbooks and five full length books of poetry, including Drafts for Shelley (Facture Press, 2001), The Epochal Body (Singing Horse Press, 2004), The Veil (Singing Horse Press, 2008), Exile's Recital (Spuyten Duyvil, 2016), Torture Papers (Spuyten Duyvil, 2017), and Stanzas for the Preparation of Perception (Spuyten Duyvil, 2019).  He is an associate professor in the Intellectual Heritage Program at Temple University in Philadelphia and lives in Doylestown, Pennsylvania.
